text: Morgan Park, located on the far south side of the city of Chicago, Illinois, United States. It is one of the city's 77 official community areas. 54.8% of the residents were black and 37.2% of the residents were white. As of that year it was, within Chicago, the black-majority area with the highest percentage of whites. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official City of Chicago Morgan Park Community Map * Ridge Historical Society Category:Community areas of Chicago
title: Morgan Park, Chicago
